data.title: Specialised epidermal cells surrounding the guard cells are calledBulliform cells.Complementary cellsSubsidiary cellsLenticels
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:specialised epidermal cells surrounding the guard cells are called
data.text: The stomatal pore is guarded by two kidney shaped guard cells. Name the epidermal cells surrounding the guard cells. How does a guard cell differ from an epidermal cell? Use a diagram to illustrate your answer.
